trans-unit.source: This calling convention is not supported in this version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 這個呼叫慣例在這個 .NET Framework 版本中不支援。

trans-unit.source: The `__fastcall` calling convention specifies that arguments to functions be passed in registers, when possible.
trans-unit.target: `__fastcall`呼叫慣例會指定函數的引數會傳入暫存器，可能的話。

trans-unit.source: The classes in <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices> are for compiler writers' use only.
trans-unit.target: 中的類別<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices>編譯器撰寫者僅供使用。

trans-unit.source: Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器會發出中繼資料，以變更預設行為不適用時，在 just-in-time (JIT) 編譯器，處理值的方式中的自訂修飾詞。

trans-unit.source: When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies.
trans-unit.target: 當 JIT 編譯器遇到的自訂修飾詞時，它會處理修飾詞指定的方式中的值。

trans-unit.source: Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器可以套用的自訂修飾詞來方法、 參數和傳回值。

trans-unit.source: The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers.
trans-unit.target: JIT 編譯器的必要修飾詞必須回應，但可以忽略的選擇性修飾詞。

trans-unit.source: A C++ compiler could emit a custom modifier to describe how a byte should be treated in cases where the JIT compiler treats bytes in manner that is not compatible with C++ by default.
trans-unit.target: C + + 編譯器可以發出來描述如何 byte，應該要視為 JIT 編譯器以 c + + 與不相容的方式處理位元組中預設的自訂修飾詞。

trans-unit.source: You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques:
trans-unit.target: 您可以發出自訂修飾詞至中繼資料，使用下列技巧：

trans-unit.source: Using methods in the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> class like <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineField%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineConstructor%2A>, and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineProperty%2A>.

Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md).
trans-unit.target: 產生 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 指令檔，其中包含呼叫`modopt`和`modreq`，然後將組合至檔案最[Ilasm.exe （IL 組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。
使用 unmanaged 的反映 API。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallConvFastcall" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallConvFastcall" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The classes in <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices> are for compiler writers' use only.
trans-unit.target: 中的類別<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices>編譯器撰寫者僅供使用。
